4.5.1 - Visual inspection of final trimmed subgrade surface
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pre pavement construction visual inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Entire surface to be firm, uniform and smooth.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Height Check
Acceptance Criteria - Check to ensure pegs are still sitting at correct height from initial set out. Target MDD to be approved prior to Construction. Lab MDD Reports to be submitted for Approval.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - NDM - Dry Density
Acceptance Criteria - Mean DD ≥ 95% of MDD, Minimum DD ≥ 92% of MDD
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab & Report, NDM Report
Frequency - MDD to be determind per 5000m2 of material laid.
○ Compacted layer to be tested in 1000m2 lots, at randomly generated locations.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Benklemen Beam Test
Acceptance Criteria - Maximum Deflections of not more than (see surfacing notes)
Verifying Document - IANZ Report and Truck Weightbridge Docket (where applicable)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Survey As-built
Acceptance Criteria - Subbase level to be within +5mm / - 25mm of design
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - NDM - Dry Density
Acceptance Criteria - Mean DD ≥ 98% of MDD, Minimum DD ≥ 95% of MDD
Verifying Document - IANZ Lab & Report, NDM Report
Frequency - MDD to be determind per 5000m2 of material laid.
○ Compacted layer to be tested in 1000m2 lots, at randomly generated locations.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Benklemen Beam Test
Acceptance Criteria - Only Required if subbase BB not completed - Engineer to advise target
Verifying Document - IANZ Report and Truck Weightbridge Docket (where applicable)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Straight Edge, Survey As-built
Acceptance Criteria - Pavement shall not deviate greater than 10mm under a 3m straight edge.
○ No area of pavement shall pond water where grade is greater than 1%.
○ Pavement to be within +15mm / -5mm of design levels (or +/- 5mm against the lip of a channel)
Verifying Document - Straight Edge Sheet, Site Inspection Form, 20m Survey Cross Sections
Frequency - Once per construction area, 20m Cross Sections
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Onsite Surface Inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Shall present a swpet, tightly consolidated surface in which:
○ Large aggregate is exposed to the surface & held in place with a matrix of smaller agregates.
○ Smaller aggregate is held in place by fines material
○ Matrix does not displace under normal trafficing or sweeping.
